i"m having the same problem as audiocode....someone please help

never mind...fixed it....and I'm going to tell you how...the files are hidden...unzip...hit start button...then control panel...appearance and personalization....folder options...view tab...under advance settings "show hidden files, folders, and divers"....now go to where you unzipped the files....select all files...right click..properties..then just unchecked hidden...and that's it :)
